vendors.name: Sparrows
vendors.description: High-quality lock pick sets for hobbyists and professionals alike, offering a wide range of hooks, rakes, and tension tools suitable for various locks.

vendors.name: Peterson
vendors.description: Premium lock picks and tension tools used by locksmiths worldwide, known for durability and precision craftsmanship.

vendors.name: SouthOrd
vendors.description: Comprehensive selection of beginner and professional lock pick sets with specialized tools for pin tumblers, wafer locks, and more.

vendors.name: Multipick
vendors.description: Professional-grade locksmith tools and pick sets with ergonomic designs, suitable for pin, wafer, and disc-detainer locks.
